11

PROJECT CASE 11

Engineering Standards


Challenge

The engineering design activity undertaken in many sectors, ranging from pharmaceuticals through to aerospace, is an even more complex and challenging task that it already appears. One factor often missed is how engineers interact with a large body of engineering standards that apply constraints to almost all design decisions. Improving how engineers access and use engineering standards, and participate in their ongoing evolution, is a highly sought after, but daunting, goal.


Solution

The solution to this challenge lies in modernizing how the engineering standards themselves are maintained and made available for use within design environments. If these standards can be converted from massive bookshelves of loose-leaf binders to being data resources that can be precisely searched and directly reused, the engineering effort is given a dramatic boast in productivity. One major project undertaken by Gnostyx tackled this challenge head-on for one of the world’s leading manufacturers and delivered a solution that constituted a major competitive advantage.
